product_name: Coghlan's Pack II First Aid Kit - 2014 Overstock
long_description: Coghlan's Pack II First Aid Kit provides 37 items for the treatment of minor injuries, including a first aid guide, adhesive bandages, antiseptic pads and 2 travel towels. Case is unbreakable and water resistant, and expands to hold extras. 22 adhesive bandages: 10 - 3/8 in. x 1.5 in., 6 - 3/4 in. x 3 in., 1 - 2 in. x 4 in., 1 knuckle bandage, 4 - 4 in. strips. 3 gauze pads: 1 - 3 in. x 3 in., 2 - 2 in. x 2 in. 3 alcohol pads, 3 antiseptic pads, 1 ammonia inhalant. 1 moleskin pad: 2 in. x 3 in. 2 travel towels; 1 steel needle, 2-3/8-in. length. Coghlan's Pack II First Aid Kit includes a first aid guide. Overstock.
short_description: Coghlan's Pack II First Aid Kit provides 37 items for the treatment of minor injuries, including a first aid guide, adhesive bandages, antiseptic pads and 2 travel towels.
